Guard Stan: I was out walking through theOren Castle grounds a couple of nights ago. Truth be told, I was clearing my head - women problems, see? Anyway, there I was, when it a chill creeps up my spine and everything goes deathly quiet. Suddenly this thing appears in front of me, makes some weird old sound, and... I could feel its eyes looking... looking INTO me. Then, quick as a click, it was gone.See... told you. It was nothing.
